oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AN OBSTRUCTION TO THE SIMULTANEOUS STABILIZATION OF 2 N-D PLANTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHANKAR, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: feedback stabilization
multidimensional plants
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper calculates an obstruction to the simultaneous stabilization of two n-D plants. This obstruction is topological and lies in the (singular) cohomology of a subset of C that arises naturally in the problem. Given any family of n-D plants, the vanishing of the corresponding cohomology classes of every pair of plants in the family is thus a necessary condition for the simultaneous stabilization of the family.
